main.name: ApplicationFactory
main.description: Building Single-Page-Applications using React, Node, Javascript, MobX / Redux. Experienced in building REST APIs using PostgreSQL and a TypeORM
main.bio: Building web applications as a freelancer through my own company. Current project involves building the front end for an investors' portal using JavaScript, React and styled components, as well as developing the backend written in TypeScript using Node, a TypeORM, Express Server, JWT, and Bcrypt. Also doing Frontend development at a software company that delivers loyalty program solutions to businesses and consumers. Development of user dashboards using React and MobX, Javascript, Typescript, Sass. Rapidly changing business requirements are taken up in scrum meetings and daily stand-ups. Daily usage of JIRA and Bitbucket. 1 to 2 week sprints.

education.description: Graduated the immersive 10 week course on complete stacks composed of JavaScript, jQuery, Node(incl. ES6), TypeScript, Jest, Enzyme, Docker, Express, React, SQL, Redux, HTML5, and CSS3. Project workflow includes code reviews and quality assessments, standard practices such as TDD, basics of product development, UX design, and domain modeling, working together in teams using modern tools like Git, Atom, Github, CI, Trello, and Slack.
Neuroscience, Biomedicine, Cognition, Public Health, Molecular Biology
World history, politics, computer science, philosophy

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Frontend development at a software company that delivers loyalty program solutions to businesses and consumers. Development of user dashboards using React and MobX, Javascript, Typescript, Sass. Rapidly changing business requirements are taken up in scrum meetings and daily stand-ups. Daily usage of JIRA and Bitbucket. 1 to 2 week sprints.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Building web applications as a freelancer through my own company. Current project involves building the front end for a portal for investors using JavaScript, React and styled components and integrating it into the existing website as well as developing the backend written in TypeScript using Node, a TypeORM, as well as Express Server, JWT, and Bcrypt.

work.title: Founder
work.description: Set up a freelance business in the field of English language education. Designed and managed the website (easyenglishtraining.nl) and its SEO. Set up and managed adverstising mediums (Google AdWords, Facebook Ads, Marktplaats Ads). Individual and group English lessons, translations, and job interview training. 130+ satisfied and returning clients.

work.title: Research Intern
work.description: Research study on thermoregulatory processes in collaboration with the Open Science Framework.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
